sources.title: Knife of Ice (1972) Carroll Baker, Alan Scott, Ida Galli | Horror, Mystery, Thriller | Full Movie
sources.description:
A mute woman finds herself at the center of a series of murders in the mountains of Spain, which police suspect are being committed by a drug-addled Satanist.

Original title: Il coltello di ghiaccio  (1972)  AKA: Silent Horror

Director: Umberto Lenzi
Writers: Umberto LenziAntonio Troiso
Stars: Carroll Baker, Alan Scott, Ida Galli
Genres: Horror, Mystery, Thriller

This film is available with English & Italian audio. 
Go to video settings ⚙️  to change your audio / subtitle language options.

sources.title: Il coltello di ghiaccio
sources.description: Title: Il coltello di ghiaccio Summary: As a thirteen year old, Martha Caldwell witnessed the death of her parents in a terrible railway accident. Barely surviving the tragedy herself, Martha was struck dumb due to the shock. Now... Directed by: Umberto Lenzi Actors: Carroll Baker, Alan Scott, Evelyn Stewart Production Company: Mundial Film Release Date: 24 August 1972 (Italy) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 As a thirteen year old, Martha Caldwell witnessed the death of her parents in a terrible railway accident. Barely surviving the tragedy herself, Martha was struck dumb due to the shock. Now an adult, the still mute Martha lives with her uncle Ralph in the Spanish countryside. Martha's cousin Jenny arrives to be with the family but is quickly stabbed to death. It appears that a sex maniac is roaming the countryside; killing pretty young girls. The already traumatized Martha seems likely to be the next victim but the case turns out to be far more complicated than it would first seem.

metadata.Plot: As a thirteen year old, Martha Caldwell witnessed the death of her parents in a terrible railway accident. Barely surviving the tragedy herself, Martha was struck dumb due to the shock. Now an adult, the still mute Martha lives with her uncle Ralph in the Spanish countryside. Martha's cousin Jenny arrives to be with the family but is quickly stabbed to death. It appears that a sex maniac is roaming the countryside; killing pretty young girls. The already traumatized Martha seems likely to be the next victim but the case turns out to be far more complicated than it would first seem.
